summary:
I am interested in expanding my

professional horizons by seeking new challenges and responsibilities.

As a team member in your organization, I can provide:

 Efficiency, reliability, accuracy with numbers

 Maturity, honesty, ability to look at challenges as opportunities

 Flexibility to adapt to changes

 Pro-active thinking, and identifying developmental areas

I have made contributions to my previous employer that has benefited the bottom line.

These accomplishments are derived from my excellent interpersonal and

communication skills, strong attention to details and disciplined work ethic. I will strive to

contribute to your organization’s goals, objectives and values. I am enthusiastic about

exploring opportunities and learning new things.

certifications.name: Lean Six Sigma White Belt Certification
certifications.authority: The Council for Six Sigma Certification (CSSC)

company.name: The Council for Six Sigma Certification (CSSC)

profile_positions.description:
Providing first 90 day implementation assistance to all customers, including up to all of the following:

Introduction to Practice Ignition
One on one consultations, check in and advisory calls 
Delivery of wider team training presentations 
Support assistance and distribution of educational resources 
Workflow implementation sessions
On-site training visits where there’s opportunity 
Live training webinar presentations 


Working to help customers meet key milestones towards adoption of Practice Ignition within first 90 days, including:
Bringing clients on to the system
Using the payment platform
Utilizing new features and updates
Continuing to use Practice Ignition


Monitoring the health of customers through onboarding:
Keeping track of engagement frequency (calls, emails to clients, support tickets etc) and reaching out when a CSM input is necessary
Keeping track of usage/activity level within the app
Monitoring at-risk clients (low engagement, low usage) to prevent churn
Ensuring that customer data is up to date and accurate to ensure ongoing success beyond the CSM stage of the customer life cycle
Following up with customers who’ve yet to book time with a CSM to ensure all customers have access to CSM onboarding
Working with the global Customer Success team to continue to improve processes and aid one another’s development


Additional tasks:

Monitor helpdesk and assist the support team to help keep our support metrics positive
Assist in building out internal and external playbooks 
Monitor and post in the Facebook group as required
Assist in production of CSM content (blog posts, best practice support articles, videos)
Working with the wider Customer Experience team to deliver best practice webinars
profile_positions.title: Customer Success Manager

profile_positions.description:
Experiment and innovate with techniques to ensure ongoing partner success. 
Build and refine internal processes that can scale as the team grows. 

Reviews & strategising
Book out time with the entire Partner Success Team members to review overall process 
Review calls & strategise with each PSC member to adapt processes in accordance with key issues 
Handle all call reviews and risk reviews to ensure one standardised process across team

Shaping the Team
As with the Partner Success team in SA, the ADC team will require similar experimentation and innovation to ensure we continually meet our monthly sales goals
Assisting with recruitment of new ADCs and ensuring that they are onboarded and trained correctly

Reviews & strategising
Work with the ADC team to manage their opportunity pipeline and ensure they are on track to hit their monthly sales target
Conduct call reviews with ADCs to help them increase their mastery of the role and strategize on how to approach their book of business
Work with Head of Sales to ensure that monthly targets are set and aligned with the regions goals
profile_positions.title: Partner Success and Account Development Manager

profile_positions.description: Determine the Partners that are at risk of churn and develop a process to target them based on their requirements. •Proactively engage with partners that are at high risk of churn to ensure churn prevention. •Build on existing reporting to enhance Receipt Bank’s ability to prevent churn of both partners and partners’ clients. Shaping the Team•Experiment and innovate with techniques to ensure ongoing partner success. •Build and refine internal processes that can scale as the team grows. Partner Feedback & Re-engagement•Build on existing reporting to enhance Receipt Bank’s ability to reverse churn of both partners and partners’ clients.•Collect and collate feedback from churned partners to highlight key issues in your specific region. . •Experiment and innovate with techniques to reverse partner churn.
profile_positions.title: Partner Success Consultant - Retentions

profile_positions.description:
 Management of day to day performance of the Helpdesk Consultant team.
 Review daily reports for accurate resolution of cases across all clients and products
 Assessing the escalation routes of queries across the various applications and on to the appropriate teams (region)
 Time and attendance, Shift Roster amendments
 Daily performance review of each HDC with Targets
 Manage 2nd Line work allocation
 Liaise with Helpdesk Administrator on work allocation for Bulk tasks requested by Support Managers
 Investigate any breaches in SLO by the Helpdesk Consultant team
 Help the Team prioritise work & tasks
 Update the Wiki on a regular basis
 Manage real-time escalations from the Consultant Team.
 Communicate with the Helpdesk manager daily regarding consultant tasks
 Monitor Helpdesk Consultant Dashboards
 Assist & identify training with the Team.
 Ensure Team is knowledgeable and equipped to deal with the full range of case types and job requirements
 Weekly and bi-weekly reporting on SLO’s and performance
 KPI’s using a SWAT analysis
 Disciplinary Procedures and Performance related issues within the team
 Assist the Tier 1 Team lead with daily outputs
 Create a fair work environment
 Maintain the current WLT culture within the teams
profile_positions.title: Helpdesk Consultant Team Lead

profile_positions.description:
•	Mapping a new account’s user base to enable a list of template profiles to be created 
•	Gathering all pre-approved user details for bulk registration 
•	Identifying the training needs of each template profile 
•	Mapping and creating approval template profiles, groups and processes 
•	Responsible for scoping migrated data, creating meta data frameworks and auditable transition plans 
•	Manage bulk uploads of data and QC process 
•	Responsible for building multiple data forms 
•	Creating an on-brand site across multiple browsers, in accordance with the clients supplied guidelines 
•	Gathering and briefing all branding to the internal Design, Product and development teams 
•	Testing branding in all environments 
•	Manage the build of splash pages and branded emails 
•	In conjunction with the cmd Implementation Manager, scope all configuration requirements for new site builds and document 
•	Responsible for building a new instance of cmd, applying agreed configurations and managing the clients approval of agreed configurations 
•	Responsible for implementing the configuration of any extended services or modules within Tag’s MRM solution 
•	Accountable for delivering reporting examples through SSRS 
•	Manage the creation and implementation of user guides and eLearning modules 
•	Create and maintain throughout the Implementation phase, wiki pages, detailing the new or existing client’s requirements 
•	Responsible for launch communications 
•	Accountable for handover documentation to Support team
profile_positions.title: Technical Implementation Associate

profile_positions.description:
•	Product Support
•	Day to day responsibility of managing client’s software requirements
•	Gathering and investigating issues, escalating to the appropriate channels when necessary
•	Site administration and business software support
•	Setting and managing product support tickets
•	3rd line Support for incidents and queries escalated from the Tag CMD Service Desk
•	Brief CMD Service Desk with configuration requests where appropriate                                                                 
•	Branding & rebranding
•	Maintaining an on-brand site across multiple browsers, in accordance with the client’s supplied guidelines, including regular updates to splash page content
•	Gathering and briefing any rebranding requirements clearly to internal Tag teams
•	Testing rebranding in all environments to the required standards
•	QA and UAT tests of development tickets
•	Raise development and database support requests.
•	Identifying software bugs and providing feedback to development teams
•	Testing software development updates on LIVE environments post release
•	Reporting
•	In conjunction with the Tag Delivery Manager, scope all reporting requirements
•	Build, test and deliver monthly/quarterly/annual reports to the client’s specifications
•	Managing user creation and permissions
•	In conjunction with the Tag Delivery Manager, scope all template users
•	Maintain and manage template users including updates to roles and permissions
•	Manage knowledgebase guidelines on user creation and subsequent updates
•	Create new users and administer basic login/ navigational training
•	Log time spent on individual clients
•	Supporting Account Management teams of various clients
•	Hosting Client conference calls with Account Management team, to manage client expectations and requirements of software
•	Hosting training sessions with various account management teams, as well as clients and CMD Helpdesk
•	Building training documentation and user guides
profile_positions.title: Technical Delivery Associate

profile_positions.description:
•	Managing service requests for software
•	Managing SLO as well as adhering to SLO for support cases logged
•	Escalating to Support managers and other team members
•	Using workflows for all clients
•	Registering users
•	Troubleshooting users queries via email and telephonically
•	Supporting various Browsers, e.g. IE, Firefox and Chrome
•	Time Management and effective planning to ensure cases are resolved timeously
•	As a consultant: assisting TDA with bulk work (asset uploads and urgent registrations) and completing these task well within deadline
•	Communicating well with Support Manager and their teams by: effective escalating production queries 
•	Displaying strong software knowledge: through own efforts and testing, troubleshoot difficult queries
•	Gathering and sharing software knowledge with Supervisor to assist team members
•	Updating Knowledgebase and training teammates
•	Extracting SQL reports and converting to excel
profile_positions.title: Helpdesk Consultant

profile_positions.description:
•	Supporting in house Media Resource Management Portals
•	Using Knowledge base
•	Logging cases using Microsoft CRM
•	Troubleshoot user Profile issues causing errors
•	Registering Users onto portal
•	Resetting Passwords according to strict client criteria
•	Make use of a Knowledge base to get answers quickly
•	Communicate verbally and in writing with users globally
•	Assisting users with software issue and how to use it
•	Displaying initiative by :assisting with processes for clients and assisting users telephonically using CMD
•	Assisting Consultants with bulk registration of users for various clients, as well as updating users profiles
profile_positions.title: Helpdesk Operator

profile_positions.description:
•	First line user support telephonically & via email. 
•	Basic daily administrative duties such as reporting statistics. 
•	User administration (adding new users to the system). 
•	Testing of changes implemented before changes are deployed. 
•	Determining change needs & where to better system.
profile_positions.title: IT Helpdesk Consultant

profile_positions.description:
•	Logging calls for Stores and Head Office users for computer/system issues as well as doing the necessary troubleshooting and problem solving
•	Providing feedback to users
•	Managing SLA’s
•	Escalations to relevant teams/managers
•	Ownership of calls, follow up of calls and accurate  feedback to the users, ensuring calls are resolved in accordance with the service level agreement of the company
profile_positions.title: Service Desk Agent
